title: He’s Never Pleased
itunes:title: He’s Never Pleased
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 34 years old and I own a hair salon in strip mall. I have been hanging out with a 38 year old dentist who works directly above my salon. I need your advice on how to deal with him. He is never ever pleased with anything and the first time we met, he came down to my salon and told me to turn my music down. I told him to relax and he got mad.......................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 34 years old and I own a hair salon in strip mall. I have been hanging out with a 38 year old dentist who works directly above my salon. I need your advice on how to deal with him. He is never ever pleased with anything and the first time we met, he came down to my salon and told me to turn my music down. I told him to relax and he got mad.......................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
